channel.title: Instagram on Obryan Poyser

item.title: World Cup players' hype on Instagram
item.description: Javier is visiting me for a couple of days here in Barcelona. This silly guy is trying to measure the relation between social media representativeness and expectations of qualifying in the group phase of the World Cup. It seems that he is collecting the information going from page to pageâ€¦ I as a benevolent friend create a classic scraping function to make his life easier (maybe it can make your life better as well)
